item.title: Mundane
item.description: In most senses of the word - places that I have been to over the years. Places that I have not really stopped to think about, and have just passed by.
item.content:encoded:
adjective | /ˈmʌndeɪn,mʌnˈdeɪn/

In most senses of the word - places that I have been to over the years. Places that I have not really stopped to think about, and have just passed by.

import MasonryLayout from '../../components/Masonry.astro';

<MasonryLayout images={[ { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/mundane_1.JPG", alt: "mundane 1" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/mundane_2.JPG", alt: "Mundane 2" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/mundane_3.JPG", alt: "Mundane 3" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/mundane_4.JPG", alt: "Mundane 4" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/mundane_5.JPG", alt: "Mundane 5" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/mundane_6.JPG", alt: "Mundane 6" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/mundane_7.JPG", alt: "Mundane 7" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/mundane_8.JPG", alt: "Mundane 8" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/mundane_9.JPG", alt: "Mundane 9" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/mundane_10.JPG", alt: "Mundane 10" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/mundane_11.JPG", alt: "Mundane 11" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/mundane_12.JPG", alt: "Mundane 12" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/mundane_13.JPG", alt: "Mundane 13" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/mundane_14.JPG", alt: "Mundane 14" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/mundane_15.JPG", alt: "Mundane 15" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/mundane_16.JPG", alt: "Mundane 16" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/mundane_17.JPG", alt: "Mundane 17" }, ]} />
item.author: Erfi Anugrah

item.title: Hypnagogia
item.description: The perception of time has changed for me, rather drastically in fact. I started seeing things a little bit differently, moments of wonder and awe was had even for the smallest of occurences, which normally would have been something I just ignore.
item.content:encoded:
noun | hip-nuh-GAH-jia

The perception of time has changed for me, rather drastically in fact. I started seeing things a little differently, moments of wonder and awe were had even for the smallest of occurrences, which normally would have been something I just ignore. This perceived oddity led me to think about being in between states (hence the title).

I have often referred to myself in the third person, occasionally looked upon my own hands and think to myself, "Right, I do exist right now, in this moment, as a person". Taken around a place I grew up in, I wanted to evoke that sense of derealisation in this series of images.

import MasonryLayout from '../../components/Masonry.astro';

<MasonryLayout images={[ { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/hypnagogia_1.JPG", alt: "hypnagogia 1" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/hypnagogia_2.JPG", alt: "hypnagogia 2" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/hypnagogia_3.JPG", alt: "hypnagogia 3" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/hypnagogia_4.JPG", alt: "hypnagogia 4" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/hypnagogia_5.JPG", alt: "hypnagogia 5" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/hypnagogia_6.JPG", alt: "hypnagogia 6" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/hypnagogia_7.JPG", alt: "hypnagogia 7" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/hypnagogia_8.JPG", alt: "hypnagogia 8" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/hypnagogia_9.JPG", alt: "hypnagogia 9" }, ]} />
item.author: Erfi Anugrah

item.title: Obsolescence
item.description: The impermanence of things; a matter of eventuality, presents themselves in a rather alien way than what I am used to. In a sense, makes for a feeling of saudade.
item.content:encoded:
noun | /ˌɑːbsəˈlesns/

The impermanence of things; a matter of eventuality,  presents themselves in a rather alien way than what I am used to. In a sense, makes for a feeling of saudade.

import MasonryLayout from '../../components/Masonry.astro';

<MasonryLayout images={[ { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/obsolescence_1.jpg", alt: "Obsolescence 1" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/obsolescence_2.jpg", alt: "Obsolescence 2" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/obsolescence_3.jpg", alt: "Obsolescence 3" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/obsolescence_4.jpg", alt: "Obsolescence 4" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/obsolescence_5.jpg", alt: "Obsolescence 5" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/obsolescence_6.jpg", alt: "Obsolescence 6" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/obsolescence_7.jpg", alt: "Obsolescence 7" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/obsolescence_8.jpg", alt: "Obsolescence 8" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/obsolescence_9.jpg", alt: "Obsolescence 9" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/obsolescence_10.jpg", alt: "Obsolescence 10" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/obsolescence_11.jpg", alt: "Obsolescence 11" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/obsolescence_12.jpg", alt: "Obsolescence 12" }, ]} />
item.author: Erfi Anugrah

item.title: Faroe islands
item.description: Muted sounds, tiny waves crashing. My limbs wading, cutting through. For a time, the only instance for when I could sequester myself away from the world.
item.content:encoded:
noun | /pəˈliːstɹə/, /pəˈlʌɪstɹə/

Muted sounds, tiny waves crashing. My limbs wading, cutting through. For a time, the only instance for when I could sequester myself away from the world.

import MasonryLayout from '../../components/Masonry.astro';

<MasonryLayout images={[ { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/palaestra_1.jpg", alt: "Palaestra 1" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/palaestra_2.jpg", alt: "Palaestra 2" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/palaestra_3.jpg", alt: "Palaestra 3" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/palaestra_4.jpg", alt: "Palaestra 4" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/palaestra_5.jpg", alt: "Palaestra 5" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/palaestra_6.jpg", alt: "Palaestra 6" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/palaestra_7.jpg", alt: "Palaestra 7" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/palaestra_8.jpg", alt: "Palaestra 8" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/palaestra_9.jpg", alt: "Palaestra 9" }, { src: "https://cdn.erfianugrah.com/palaestra_10.jpg", alt: "Palaestra 10" }, ]} />
